title: 05/24/21 DPS Best Of
itunes:title: 05/24/21 DPS Best Of
description:
On today's Dan Patrick Show, DP discusses Phil Mickelson's historical win from the weekend. Did the win top Tiger's performance at the Masters in 2019. Reggie Miller joins us to recap the playoffs and gives advice to Trae Young on how to deal with Spike Lee. And CBS Golf Analyst Nick Faldo discusses the atmosphere yesterday at Kiawah Island.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
